parameters.name: CustomActionArn
parameters.description: Returns the fully defined Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom action.

nested_items.name: CustomActionArn
nested_items.description: The fully defined Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom action.

nested_items.name: Definition
nested_items.description: The definition of the command to run when invoked an alias or as an action button.

nested_items.name: CommandText
nested_items.description: The command string to run which may include variables by prefixing with a dollar sign ($).

nested_items.name: AliasName
nested_items.description: The name used to invoke this action in the chat channel. For example, @aws run my-alias.

nested_items.name: Attachments
nested_items.description: Defines when this custom action button should be attached to a notification.

nested_items.name: NotificationType
nested_items.description: The type of notification that the custom action should be attached to.

nested_items.name: ButtonText
nested_items.description: The text of the button that appears on the notification.

nested_items.name: Criteria
nested_items.description: The criteria for when a button should be shown based on values in the notification.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The operation to perform on the named variable.

nested_items.name: VariableName
nested_items.description: The name of the variable to operate on.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value that is compared with the actual value of the variable based on the behavior of the operator.

nested_items.name: Variables
nested_items.description: The variables to extract from the notification.

nested_items.name: ActionName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom action that is included in the ARN.
